long_description: Offering ample room for 2 large sleepers and bulky gear, the Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent offers a 6 lbs. 6 oz. shelter for spring, summer and fall weather. Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent features an 8 x 4.5 ft. floor length to offer room for bulky gear or stretching out. A door on either side offers convenience for gear organization and middle-of-the-night bathroom runs; a vestibule over each door protects gear and shelters the entrances. Fast, easy-to-pitch hub/pole design helps reduce pitching errors. The Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent comes with rainfly, stuff sacks, stakes and guyline/tighteners. Average minimum weight specification is based on tent, rainfly and poles only. PVC-free seam tape, superseal floor, dye-free optic white canopy; reflective door trim and/or guy outs; hanging pockets; stash door; sew-free window. Closeout.
short_description: Offering ample room for 2 large sleepers and bulky gear, the Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent offers a 6 lbs. 6 oz. shelter for spring, summer and fall weather.
